sections.heading: by gift or exercise of power of appointment
sections.text: A person may make a transfer by irrevocable gift to, or the irrevocable exercise of a power of appointment in favor of, a custodian for the benefit of a minor pursuant to section 43-2710.SourceLaws 1992, LB 907, ยง 5.

43-2705.Transfer by gift or exercise of power of appointment.

A person may make a transfer by irrevocable gift to, or the irrevocable exercise of a power of appointment in favor of, a custodian for the benefit of a minor pursuant to section 43-2710.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 907, ยง 5.
